attributes.action: Instruct Scottish First Minister Nicola Sturgeon MSP to declare her expenses
attributes.additional_details:
There is a growing public interest in the expenditure Ms Sturgeon is costing the public purse . She has set up ' expert ' Brexit committees, she has went on numerous trips to Europe to meet with several EU officials of which is not her remit as head of a UK devolved assembly.
This has been made even more clearly in the last week by the Supreme Court ruling that international affairs are not the business of regional assemblies.
Ms Sturgeon has repeatedly denied requests to reveal her expenditure.
attributes.background: Scottish Regional Assembly First Minister Nicola Sturgeoen MSP has over the last financial year continued to refuse to declare the expense she has cost the public purse on her many trips all over Europe in a fruitless attempt to derail the Brexit process as voted for by 18 million British Citizens

rejection.details: You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
